messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: We are building a DNA vault. Rember sssuit sssensssorsss. Oh alssso monkey transssforming dissseassse and traitorsss

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Space Station 13, please stand-by.

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: As Your Clown RD. It is my job to inform you that the best way to describe the sun is sunny.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Security Alert

Gr3y.T1d3 virus detected in Space Station 13 door subroutines. Severity level of 1. Recommend station AI involvement.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on our sophisticated probabilistic models, we believe that one of the station's pets has developed [REDACTED] level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Bar.

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: Come to Bar and smell the stinky gas its quite toxic. I wonder who caused it

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: All crew pleassse report to medbay for a mandatory blood sssample

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: Captain Enjoys our blood.

messages.author: Head of Personnel's Desk
messages.body: We need someone to go to LavalandUSA, come to hop line to be miner

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: Don't remember having blood filled syringes in my office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: I have discovered the duck that goes honk on the bridge

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: There is a devil, people are dying and the shift's been long.

messages.author: Research Director's Desk
messages.body: Prehaps the captain has been replaced by the Honkmother

messages.author: Bridge
messages.body: Honk Time
